name: QB to the right
description:
It's a short platformer made for the 2020 GMTK game jam. It was mostly inspired by my keyboard with it's broken cable. Every once in a while it disconnects, and if it happens during gaming then my character will be stuck going to the direction it was last going. And I thought after hearing the theme of the jam: "Hey, that could make a cool game! An annoying one, but a cool one" And what you see above is the final product.

Music used: A Quiet thought - Wayne Jones

No. 7: Alone wtih my thoughts - Esther Abrami
